articles.author: Mark Milligan
articles.title: Lost world discovered beneath Antarctic ice - HeritageDaily
articles.description: A large-scale transcontinental river system from the Eocene era, dating back 44 to 34 million years ago, has been discovered beneath the Antarctic ice. - HeritageDaily - Archaeology News
articles.content:
A large-scale transcontinental river system from the Eocene era, dating back 44 to 34 million years ago, has been discovered beneath the Antarctic ice.
